name: mfsaccelerator

scripts.start-services: concurrently "yarn workspace @mfs/dashboard start" "yarn workspace @mfs/i18n start" "yarn workspace @mfs/ui-library start" "yarn workspace @mfs/rest-api start" "yarn workspace @mfs/angular serve:single-spa:mfs-angular"

author: Vladyslav Bezruchko, Ivan Vynnyk, Volodymyr Fedak
